dissthispkgr 2023.01.01
  • Reference

    Summarize data frame with target summary statistics

    summarize_diss.Rd

    summarize_diss takes a data frame to summarize data in a concise format. The output closely resembles skimr::skim(), but with all the unnecessary information removed.

    summarize_diss(data, summary_vars, summary_stats)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame to summarize.

    summary_vars

    A set of columns of interest.

    summary_stats

    A set of summary statistics of interest.

    Value

    Summarized object with groups intact.

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
mtcars %>%
 group_by(cyl, gear) %>%
 summarize_diss(c("mpg", "disp"), c("mean", "sd", "median", "min", "max"))
#> # A tibble: 32 × 8
#> # Groups:   cyl, gear [8]
#>      cyl  gear variable   mean    sd median   min   max
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <chr>     <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1     4     3 mpg_mpg    21.5 NA      21.5  NA    21.5
#>  2     4     3 disp_mpg  120.  NA     120.   NA   120. 
#>  3     4     3 mpg_disp   NA   NA      NA    21.5  NA  
#>  4     4     3 disp_disp  NA   NA      NA   120.   NA  
#>  5     4     4 mpg_mpg    26.9 NA      25.8  NA    33.9
#>  6     4     4 disp_mpg  103.  NA      93.5  NA   147. 
#>  7     4     4 mpg_disp   NA    4.81   NA    21.4  NA  
#>  8     4     4 disp_disp  NA   30.7    NA    71.1  NA  
#>  9     4     5 mpg_mpg    28.2 NA      28.2  NA    30.4
#> 10     4     5 disp_mpg  108.  NA     108.   NA   120. 
#> # ℹ 22 more rows
